companies.name: Amazon
companies.description: Amazon.com, Inc., is an American multinational conglomerate technology company based in Seattle, with 750,000 employees.

companies.name: Apple
companies.description: Apple Inc. is an American multinational technology company headquartered in Cupertino, California, that designs, develops, and sells consumer electronics, computer software, and online services

companies.name: Google
companies.description: Google LLC is an American multinational technology company that specializes in Internet-related services and products, which include online advertising technologies, a search engine, cloud computing, software, and hardware
